Most of the books work fine but warriors power of three wont work for me, it says it is owned by another user if I try to use it on my kindle, any help with this?

@super4529
Po3 1-5 are basic PDF files and should work however you go to read them, they should open in most ebook readers. I know i can open them in ibooks, adobe and kindle.

Po3 6 is a azw file, which means that it was purchased and has copyright shit going along.
no solution other than to see if you can find it online somewhere else or buy the book. I've been looking but haven't found anything yet.
